About Me

  I am a student and baseball athlete at Eastern Mennonite University and will be graduating with a BS in Computer Science and a minor in Business Administration in May 2020. I am seeking a computer science position with an organization where I can apply my knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Python to grow the success of the company. I am very team oriented and have learned through my experiences playing collegiate baseball and working on a packaging line the importance of each contributor.
